alert.note: Alert for Sioux (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Heat Advisory issued June 18 at 9:44AM CDT until June 19 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT/7 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING... ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT/7 PM MDT/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heat index values as high as 100 today and Sunday. For the Wind Advisory, southeast winds around 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Sioux County * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 8 PM CDT/7 PM MDT/ this evening. For the Heat Advisory, until 8 PM CDT/7 PM MDT/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures and high humidity may cause heat illnesses. Strong winds could blow around unsecured objects.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Use extra caution. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
